import './ExpenseForm.css' import { useState } from 'react' const ExpenseForm = () => { const [enteredTitle, setEnteredTitle] = useState({ enteredTitle: '', enteredAmount: '', enteredDate: '' }); const onChangeTitle = (event) => { setEnteredTitle(event.target.value) console.log(enteredTitle) } const [enteredAmount, setEnteredAmount] = useState(''); const onChangeAmount = (event) => { setEnteredAmount(event.target.value) console.log(enteredAmount) } const [enteredDate, setEnteredDate] = useState(''); const onChangeDate = (event) => { setEnteredDate(event.target.value) console.log(enteredDate) } return (
) } export default ExpenseForm
